remarks: Append one path segment to an Eulerian path (enlarging the graph to add the new edge).  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2015.)
statement:
eupap1.e $e |- ( ph -> E Fn A ) $.
eupap1.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
eupap1.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. _V ) $.
eupap1.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. V ) $.
eupap1.d $e |- ( ph -> -. B e. A ) $.
eupap1.g $e |- ( ph -> G ( V EulPaths E ) P ) $.
eupap1.n $e |- ( ph -> N = ( # ` G ) ) $.
eupap1.f $e |- F = ( E u. { <. B , { ( P ` N ) , C } >. } ) $.
eupap1.h $e |- H = ( G u. { <. ( N + 1 ) , B >. } ) $.
eupap1.q $e |- Q = ( P u. { <. ( N + 1 ) , C >. } ) $.
eupap1 $p |- ( ph -> H ( V EulPaths F ) Q ) $.
